1001_my_first_char.json.title: My First Character / Level 1-10
1001_my_first_char.json.comment_one: For your very first character in Legends of Idleon, you would put at least 10 points into 'Sharpened Axe', which gives you a flat damage bonus
1001_my_first_char.json.notes: Welcome to the game! It will be a great journey, hope we'll see you again!

2001_1_wood_act.json.title: Woodcutter Active / AFK (Mage) 30+
2001_1_wood_act.json.comment_one: Max Smart Efficiency, Mana Booster, Book Of the Wise and Active AFK'er in that order. Excess points can go into LUK.
2001_1_wood_act.json.comment_two:
Max Logs On Logs, Leaf Thief, Deforesting All Doubt, Mana Overdrive, Individual Insight, and Inner Peace in that order.
Excess points can go into teleportation to move quicker.
2001_1_wood_act.json.comment_three: Max Earlier Education, Stupendous Statues,and WIS Mumbo in that order./nIf you are using WIS obols put excess points into Occult Obols

2001_2_Alchemy_Choppin_hybrid.json.title: Alchemy / Choppin Hybrid (Shaman) 100+
2001_2_Alchemy_Choppin_hybrid.json.comment_three: 12>13(only if you still need alchemy xp on shaman)>14>8>9

2001_3_Worship_Choppin_hybrid.json.title: Worship / Choppin Hybrid (Wizard) 100+
2001_3_Worship_Choppin_hybrid.json.notes: skipping xp talents cause you usually dont have any need for xp when you decide to make hybrid build

2001_catch_act.json.title: Catching Active / AFK (Bowman)
2001_catch_act.json.comment_one:
Max out both "Elusive efficiency"  and "Quickness boots"
*1- you can invest into "Broken time" with excess points.
2001_catch_act.json.comment_two:
Max "Sanic speed" and "Garb of Un'AGI'ng Quality" to boost "Briar patch runner on tab 3
"Focused Soul" for xp gains
2001_catch_act.json.comment_three:
You have ability to invest into 3 efficiency skills overall, "Briar patch runner" and "Teleki'Net'ic" are both great sources of that.
Consider maxing out "Sunset on Hives" for more afk  gains, "Bug enthusiast" is for speeding up xp gain.
2001_catch_act.json.notes: With around 100k oak logs + ~400 agi you'll be able to catch fruitflies, but at very slow rate.

2002_catching_100.json.title: Catching 100+
2002_catching_100.json.comment_one: Max Elusive Efficiency and Quickness Boots in that order. Extra Points can go into Broken Time and LUK.
2002_catching_100.json.comment_two: Max Sanic Speed, Garb Of Un'AGI'ing Quality and Focused Soul in that order. Extra points can go into Yea I Already Know.
2002_catching_100.json.comment_three:
Max Sunset On The Hives, Briar Patch Runner, Teleki'net'ic Logs, Swifty Statues, AGI Again and Shoeful Of Obol.
Extra points can go into Previous Points.

2003_1_min_act.json.title: Mining Active / AFK (Warrior) 30+
2003_1_min_act.json.comment_one:
You want to max "Brute Efficiency" and "Idle Skilling", then "Fist of Rage".
*1 - You can invest here if your alchemy bubble is giving nice bonus to efficiency.
2003_1_min_act.json.comment_two:
You want to max "Big Pick", then "Tempestuous Emotions", and mix the mining talents.
*1 - You can invest here if your alchemy bubble is giving nice bonus to efficiency.
*2 You can max "Firmly Grasp It" If you've maxed mining talents already.
2003_1_min_act.json.comment_three:
Get "Strongest Statues" and "Back to Basics" to 100.
Excess points can go towards "Str Summore"

2003_2_min_act_w3.json.title: Mining Active / AFK (Warrior) 100+
2003_2_min_act_w3.json.comment_one: Max Brute Efficiency, Health Booster, Fist Of Rage and Idle Skilling in that order. Any left over points can go into LUK.
2003_2_min_act_w3.json.comment_two: Max Copper Collector, Tool Proficiency, Big Pick, Motherlode Miner and Tempestuous Emotions in that order.
2003_2_min_act_w3.json.comment_three: Max Back to Basics, Strongest Statues and STR Summore in that order. If you are using Obols with STR and have left over points, level Fistful of Obol as well.

2003_3_Mining_con_hybrid.json.title: Mining / Construction Hybrid (Squire) 100+
2003_3_Mining_con_hybrid.json.comment_two: 11>12>14>13>3>5/8>9(gold food if you have plenty of golden peanuts and jam

2003_4_fish_act.json.title: Fishing Active / AFK (Barb) 30+
2003_4_fish_act.json.comment_one: You want to max "Idle Skilling" and "Brute Efficiency", then  "Fist of Rage"
2003_4_fish_act.json.comment_two:
Maxing "Absolute Unit" and "Firmly Grasp it" gives some efficiency.
"Tempestous Emotions" provide extra xp.
2003_4_fish_act.json.comment_three:
Max "Worming Undercover" and "Catching some ZZZ's", boost "All fish diet" if you're going for xp
*1 = Boost it to around your minigame score.
*2 = Excess points here.
2003_4_fish_act.json.notes: Due to prowess effect not working active, AFK fishing will always be better if you have at least 2x prowess.

2003_5_fish_act_w3.json.title: Fishing Active / AFK (Barb) 100+
2003_5_fish_act_w3.json.comment_one:
Max Brute Efficiency, Fist of Rage and Idle Skilling in that order.
Leftover points can be put into LUK.
2003_5_fish_act_w3.json.comment_two: Max Firmly Grasp It, Absolute Unit and Tempestuous Emotions in that order. Points can also be put into 'Str'ess Tested Garb if more STR is desired.
2003_5_fish_act_w3.json.comment_three:
Max Worming Undercover, Bobbin' Bobbers, STR Summore, Strongest Statues, All Fish Diet and Catching Some ZZZ's.
Put Points into Back To Basics and Fistful of Obol if you have extra points.

3001_journeyman_afk_40.json.title: Journeyman AFK 40
3001_journeyman_afk_40.json.comment_one: *1 = As much as needed for the zone you want to afk in.
3001_journeyman_afk_40.json.comment_two: Two Punch Man and Combat Skills effect AFK gain.
3001_journeyman_afk_40.json.notes: This build is for leveling, and ignores all of the utility talents that provide help with drops and cash

3002_journeyman_afk_55.json.title: Journeyman AFK (~55)
3002_journeyman_afk_55.json.comment_one: *1 = As much as needed for the zone you want to afk in.
3002_journeyman_afk_55.json.comment_two: Two Punch Man and Combat Skills effect AFK gain.
3002_journeyman_afk_55.json.notes: This build is for leveling, and ignores all of the utility talents that provide help with drops and cash

3003_journeyman_act_70.json.title: Journeyman Active (~70)
3003_journeyman_act_70.json.comment_one: Best best is to compare points and see what gives you more damage
3003_journeyman_act_70.json.comment_two: Whip is your only damaging skill and it isnt that strong, so activing will be rough
3003_journeyman_act_70.json.notes: Active journeyman will be difficult to level. You want to try to get as much damage as you can while slowly getting whip to level 100.

3004_journeyman_afk_70.json.title: Journeyman AFK (~70)
3004_journeyman_afk_70.json.comment_one: Journeyman has 4 talents that impact damage in tab 1. Once you get those maxed, it is up to you what you want - you can go for HP/defense for survivability, movespeed, etc
3004_journeyman_afk_70.json.comment_two:
Two Punch Man and Combat Skills effect AFK gain.
*1 - At this point, you can start putting some points into non-combat bonuses, depending on what you are looking for
3004_journeyman_afk_70.json.notes: This build is for leveling, and ignores all of the utility talents that provide help with drops and cash.

3005_maestro_skill_100.json.title: Maestro Skill (~100)
3005_maestro_skill_100.json.comment_one:
For the first tab, place as many points as you can into Happy Dude. Getting 300+ will require upgrading Bliss n Chips from Tab 3.
 *1 = Once Happy Dude is maximally upgraded, the rest of Tab 1 is used for improving skill efficiency in a particular skill.
3005_maestro_skill_100.json.comment_two: Place points into "It's your Birthday!". *1 = Excess points can be placed anywhere. If you have not yet 3 starred cards, "Cards Galore" may be useful.
3005_maestro_skill_100.json.comment_three: Place as many points as possible into "Bliss n Chips". Then into "Left Hand of Learning". Afterwards, place 50+ into "Right Hand of Action". You can split the excess between the Right Hand or "Skilliest Statue"
3005_maestro_skill_100.json.notes: The goal of this build is to allow your other characters to get level 20+ on their non-specialized skills.

4001_warrior_act_35.json.title: Warrior / Active (~35)
4001_warrior_act_35.json.comment_one:
*1 = As much as you need to reach the farthest monster zone. Your goal is to reach Crabcakes to choose your subclass. For gaining levels, Sticks is a great farming zone.
After improving Accuracy prioritise "Sharpened axe" > "Gilded Sword" > "Meatshank"
4001_warrior_act_35.json.comment_two:
Put 1 points into each active skill then max "Carry a Big Stick".
*1 = Excess points can go into Double Strike up to 41 PTS.
 1 point into "Firmly Grasp It" gives extra STR.
4001_warrior_act_35.json.notes: That's how your build should roughly look when pushing for subclass.

4001_warrior_afk_35.json.title: Warrior / AFK (~35)
4001_warrior_afk_35.json.comment_one:
*1 = As much as you need to reach the farthest monster zone. Your goal is to reach Crabcakes to choose your subclass. For gaining levels, Sticks is a great farming zone.
After improving Accuracy prioritise "Sharpened axe" > "Gilded Sword" > "Meatshank"
4001_warrior_afk_35.json.comment_two:
Level "Carry a Big Stick" to 50, then your active damage skills to 20. Afterwards, bring "Double Strike" up to 10. Excess points can be used to level "Carry A Big Stick" past 50.
1 point into "Firmly Grasp It" gives extra STR.
4001_warrior_afk_35.json.notes: That's how your build should roughly look when pushing for subclass.

4103_barb_act_50.json.title: Barbarian / Active (~50)
4103_barb_act_50.json.comment_one:
*1 = Boost WIS to have as much accuracy as you need for the best AFK gains. Usually this will be the farthest monster you can reach without dying. If you're low on defense, by this point equipping food to stay alive is normal and expected.
After improving Accuracy prioritise "Sharpened axe" > "Gilded Sword" > "Meatshank"
4103_barb_act_50.json.comment_two:
Put 1 points into each active skill then max "Carry a Big Stick". Then, place 41 points into Double Strike.
*1 = Spread excess points equally between "Absolute Unit" and "Strength in Numbers". 
1 point into "Firmly Grasp It" gives extra STR.
4103_barb_act_50.json.comment_three:
Put 1 point in every active skill, then 100 into "Back To Basics".
*1 = Excess points can be used to level active skills.

4103_barb_act_70.json.title: Barbarian / Active (~70)
4103_barb_act_70.json.comment_one:
*1 = Boost WIS to have as much accuracy as you need for the best AFK gains. Usually this will be the farthest monster you can reach without dying. If you're low on defense, by this point equipping food to stay alive is normal and expected.
After improving Accuracy prioritise "Sharpened axe" > "Gilded Sword" > "Meatshank"
*2 = Excess points into STR for damage.
4103_barb_act_70.json.comment_two:
Put 1 points into each active skill then max "Carry a Big Stick". Then, place 41 points into Double Strike.
*1 = Spread excess points equally between "Absolute Unit" and "Strength in Numbers".
*2 = Excess points can be placed here for better mob clear. Place up to 26 points.
1 point into "Firmly Grasp It" gives extra STR.
4103_barb_act_70.json.comment_three:
Put 1 point in every active skill, then 100 into "Back To Basics".
*1 = Excess points can be used to level active skills.
*2 = If you have reached World 3 and unlocked the Death Note, start preparing for "Apocalypse Zow". Have 5 mobs at 100k kills by level 85-90. Once that's done, place excess points into ZOW instead of active skills. If you are ready to start progress on ZOW, you will need to respec into a ZOW build. There is an example of a LVL 85 Barbarian ZOW build in the builds list.

4103_barb_act_85.json.title: Barbarian / Active (~85)
4103_barb_act_85.json.comment_one:
*1 = Boost WIS to have as much accuracy as you need for the zone you're farming in.
*2 = After maxing damage talents, go for HP to boost "Meatshank" bonus
4103_barb_act_85.json.comment_two:
*60 After maxing "Carry a Big Stick", place excess points into "Absolute Unit" and level it above 60. 
*1 = The rest of the excess points go into HP to try and improve "Meatshank" bonus.
4103_barb_act_85.json.comment_three:
Put 1 point in every active skill. Max "Apocalypse Zow" (To either 99 or 132, level in-between are useless), then 100 into "Back To Basics".
*1 = Excess points can be split between the two active skills.
4103_barb_act_85.json.notes: 100+ = Checkout books for these talents from the library.

4103_barb_act_85_zow.json.title: Barbarian / Active ZOW Farming (~85)
4103_barb_act_85_zow.json.comment_one: *1 = Boost your WIS to reliably hit every mob up to the end of World 2. After maxing dmg talents you want to go for hp talents, to boost "Meatshank" bonus
4103_barb_act_85_zow.json.comment_two:
After maxing damage talents you want to go for hp talents, to boost "Meatshank" bonus
*41 = After you get minimum damage high enough to 1 shot the mob your farming, move these points to %HP
4103_barb_act_85_zow.json.comment_three:
Max "Monster Decimator" and "Back to Basics", then put points into active skills.
*1 = Max it around 5 "Apocalypse zow" procs
*20 = Max this after maxing Zow
4103_barb_act_85_zow.json.notes: The goal of this build is to get as many Zow stacks as fast you can.

4104_barb_act_100.json.title: Barbarian / Active (~100)
4104_barb_act_100.json.comment_one:
*1 = Boost WIS to have as much accuracy as you need for the zone you're farming in. 
*2 = After maxing damage talents, go for HP to boost "Meatshank" bonus.
4104_barb_act_100.json.comment_two: *1 = Excess points go into HP to try and improve "Meatshank" bonus.
4104_barb_act_100.json.comment_three:
Put 1 point in every active skill. Max "Apocalypse Zow" (To either 99 or 132, levels in-between are useless), then 100 into "Back To Basics".
*1 = Excess points can be split between the two active skills.
*2 = Points can also go into "Monster Decimator" for "Apocalypse Zow".
4104_barb_act_100.json.notes: 100+ = Checkout books for these talents from the library.

4105_barb_afk_50.json.title: Barbarian / AFK (~50)
4105_barb_afk_50.json.comment_one:
*1 = Boost WIS to have as much accuracy as you need for the best AFK gains. Usually this will be the farthest monster you can reach without dying. If you're low on defense, by this point equipping food to stay alive is normal and expected.
"Idle Brawling" to 50 for 10% AFK gain rate.
Priority switches to Gilded sword > Meatshank > Sharpened axe
4105_barb_afk_50.json.comment_two:
Level "Carry A Big Stick" to 60, then your active damage skills to 45. Afterwards, bring "Double-Strike" up to 20. Excess points can be used to level "Carry A Big Stick" past 60.
 1 point into "Firmly Grasp It" gives extra STR.
4105_barb_afk_50.json.comment_three:
Level "Bear Strike" and "Axe hurl" to around 30.
*1 = You can put some points into "Back to Basics" if you're lacking points on Tab 2.
 "Mocking Shout" does not improve AFK gains, but is useful at times you want to be active.
4105_barb_afk_50.json.notes: Active Skills directly increase AFK kills/hr.

4105_barb_afk_70.json.title: Barbarian / AFK (~70)
4105_barb_afk_70.json.comment_one:
*1 = Boost WIS to have as much accuracy as you need for the best AFK gains. Usually this will be the farthest monster you can reach without dying. If you're low on defense, by this point equipping food to stay alive is normal and expected.
"Idle Brawling" to 100 for 13% AFK gain rate.
Priority switches to Gilded sword > Meatshank > Sharpened axe
4105_barb_afk_70.json.comment_two:
Level "Carry A Big Stick" to 100, then your active damage skills to 50. Afterwards, bring "Double-Strike" up to 41.
*1 = Spread excess points equally between "Absolute Unit" and "Strength In Numbers".
 1 point into "Firmly Grasp It" gives extra STR.
4105_barb_afk_70.json.comment_three:
Level "Bear Strike" and "Axe hurl" to around 70.
*1 = You can put some points into "Back to Basics" if you're lacking points on Tab 2.
 "Mocking Shout" does not improve AFK gains, but is useful at times you want to be active.
4105_barb_afk_70.json.notes: Active Skills directly increase AFK kills/hr.

4201_sqr_act_50.json.title: Squire / Active (~50)
4201_sqr_act_50.json.comment_one:
*1 = Boost WIS to have as much accuracy as you need for the best AFK gains. Usually this will be the farthest monster you can reach without dying. If you're low on defense, by this point equipping food to stay alive is normal and expected.
After improving Accuracy prioritise "Sharpened axe" > "Gilded Sword" > "Meatshank"
4201_sqr_act_50.json.comment_two:
Put 1 points into each active skill then max "Carry a Big Stick". Then, place 41 points into Double Strike.
*1 = Spread excess points equally between "Absolute Unit" and "Strength in Numbers". 
1 point into "Firmly Grasp It" gives extra STR.
4201_sqr_act_50.json.comment_three:
Put 1 point in every active skill and "Bricky Skin" to block 20% of all damage, then 100 into "Back To Basics".
*1 = Excess points can be placed here for better mob clear.

4201_sqr_act_70.json.title: Squire / Active (~70)
4201_sqr_act_70.json.comment_one:
*1 = Boost WIS to have as much accuracy as you need for the best AFK gains. Usually this will be the farthest monster you can reach without dying. If you're low on defense, by this point equipping food to stay alive is normal and expected.
After improving Accuracy prioritise "Sharpened axe" > "Gilded Sword" > "Meatshank"
*2 = Excess points into STR for damage.
4201_sqr_act_70.json.comment_two:
Put 1 points into each active skill then max "Carry a Big Stick". Then, place 41 points into Double Strike.
*1 = Spread excess points equally between "Absolute Unit" and "Strength in Numbers".
*2 = Excess points can be placed here for better mob clear. Place up to 26 points.
1 point into "Firmly Grasp It" gives extra STR.
4201_sqr_act_70.json.comment_three:
Put 1 point in every active skill and "Bricky Skin" to block 20% of all damage, then 100 into "Back To Basics".
*1 = Extra points can be placed here for better mob clear.

4202_squ_afk_50.json.title: Squire / AFK (~50)
4202_squ_afk_50.json.comment_one:
*1 = Boost WIS to have as much accuracy as you need for the best AFK gains. Usually this will be the farthest monster you can reach without dying. If you're low on defense, by this point equipping food to stay alive is normal and expected.

Level "Carry A Big Stick" to 60, then your active damage skills to 45. Afterwards, bring "Double-Strike" up to 20. Excess points can be used to level "Carry A Big Stick" past 60.

Level "Shockwave Slash" and "Daggerang" to around 30.
*1 = You can put some points into "Back to Basics" if you're lacking points on Tab 2.

4202_squ_afk_70.json.comment_one:
*1 = Boost WIS to have as much accuracy as you need for the best AFK gains. Usually this will be the farthest monster you can reach without dying. If you're low on defense, by this point equipping food to stay alive is normal and expected.
"Idle Brawling" to 100 for 13% AFK gain rate.
Priority switches to Gilded sword > Meatshank > Sharpened axe

Level "Carry A Big Stick" to 100, then your active damage skills to 55. Afterwards, bring "Double-Strike" up to 41.

 1 point into "Firmly Grasp It" gives extra STR.

Level "Shockwave Slash" and "Daggerang" to around 65.
*1 = You can put some points into "Back to basics" if you're lacking points on Tab 2.
4202_squ_afk_70.json.notes: Active Skills directly increase AFK kills/hr.

5101_bow_boss_100.json.json.title: Bowman Boss Killer
5101_bow_boss_100.json.json.comment_one: Library order: Gilded>Sharpened>Featherweigh(not possible atm)> Agi> I see you
5101_bow_boss_100.json.json.comment_two: Library order: High Polymer Limbs>Strafe>Veins>Sanic Speed>Garb of Un'AGI'ng Quality
5101_bow_boss_100.json.json.comment_three: Library order: SpeeDNA>Homing arrows>Agi again>Schwifty statues>Shoeful of obols
5101_bow_boss_100.json.json.notes: This build works best with 4 movement speed food, Boost food effect: cards/Yum Yum Desert set/PO box and King of Food trophy. If you have only 3 ms food I'd use boss card set.

5201_hunt_afk_50.json.title: Hunter AFK (50)
5201_hunt_afk_50.json.comment_one: *1= Boost str to have 308 accuracy (Sand castles) as thats the zone you will be spending quite some time at this level.
5201_hunt_afk_50.json.comment_two:
You want to level up "Piercing Arrow" and "Kung Fu Kick".
 Then increase damange with "Have Another", "High polymer limbs", and "Veins of the Infernal".
5201_hunt_afk_50.json.comment_three:
Level the 2 damaging skills evenly.
*10 = Use these to bring your damage up as needed to hit damage cap
5201_hunt_afk_50.json.notes: Damaging Skills directly increase AFK damage (multiplicative). The damage cap for a zone is the Monsterâ€™s HP. AFK damage increases above this cap will not increase your gains. AFK Damage = Minimum damage * Active Skill AFK multiplier

6001_mage_act_35.json.title: Mage / Active (~35)
6001_mage_act_35.json.comment_one:
*1 = As much as you need to reach the farthest monster zone. Your goal is to reach Crabcakes to choose your subclass. For gaining levels, Sticks is a great farming zone.
After improving Accuracy prioritise "Sharpened axe" > "Gilded Sword" > "Overclocked Energy"
6001_mage_act_35.json.comment_two:
Put 1 points into each active skill then max "Power Overwhelming".
*1 = Excess points can be evenly split between "Knowledge is Power" and "Individual Insight".
 Note: "Energy Bolt" does not work if you do not have a wand equipped.
6001_mage_act_35.json.notes: That's how your build should roughly look when pushing for subclass.

6001_mage_afk_35.json.title: Mage / AFK (~35)
6001_mage_afk_35.json.comment_one:
*1 = As much as you need to reach the farthest monster zone. Your goal is to reach Crabcakes to choose your subclass. For gaining levels, Sticks is a great farming zone.
After improving Accuracy prioritise "Sharpened axe" > "Gilded Sword" > "Overclocked Energy"
6001_mage_afk_35.json.comment_two: Level "Power Overwhelming" to 50, then your active damage skills. Excess points can be used to level "Power Overwhelming" past 50
6001_mage_afk_35.json.notes: That's how your build should roughly look when pushing for subclass.

6103_sha_act_50.json.title: Shaman / Active (~50)
6103_sha_act_50.json.comment_one:
*1 = Boost AGI to have as much accuracy as you need for the best AFK gains. Usually this will be the farthest monster you can reach without dying. If you're low on defense, by this point equipping food to stay alive is normal and expected.
After improving Accuracy prioritise "Overclocked Energy" > "Gilded Sword" > "Sharpened Axe"
6103_sha_act_50.json.comment_two:
Put 1 points into each active skill then max "Power Overwhelming".
*1 = Spread excess points equally between "Knowledge is Power" and "Individual Insight".
6103_sha_act_50.json.comment_three:
Put 1 point in every active skill, then 100 into "Earlier Education".
If you are having trouble with mana, un-equip "Sizzling Skull" due to its low cooldown and high mana cost. Also "Crazy Concoctions" only works if you're actively clicking on the screen to aim it.
*1 = Excess points can be used to level active skills.
*2 = If you have many Green Vials, you can place 20-30 points into "Virile Vials".

6103_sha_act_70.json.title: Shaman / Active (~70)
6103_sha_act_70.json.comment_one:
*1 = Boost AGI to have as much accuracy as you need for the best AFK gains. Usually this will be the farthest monster you can reach without dying. If you're low on defense, by this point equipping food to stay alive is normal and expected.
After improving Accuracy prioritise "Overclocked Energy" > "Gilded Sword" > "Sharpened Axe"
*2 = Excess points into WIS for damage and faster brew speed.
6103_sha_act_70.json.comment_two:
Put 1 points into each active skill then max "Power Overwhelming".
*1 = Spread excess points equally between "Knowledge is Power" and "Individual Insight"
6103_sha_act_70.json.comment_three:
Put 1 point in every active skill, then 100 into "Earlier Education".
If you are having trouble with mana, un-equip "Sizzling Skull" due to its low cooldown and high mana cost. Also "Crazy Concoctions" only works if you're actively clicking on the screen to aim it.
*1 = Excess points can be used to level active skills. Note that "Auspicious Aura" increases in size every 35 points. This can be useful for boss fights/colosseum.
*2 = If you have many Green Vials, you can put points into "Virile Vials".

6103_sha_act_90_camarok.json.title: Shaman / Active C.Amarok Killer (~90)
6103_sha_act_90_camarok.json.comment_one:
*1 = Boost AGI to have 2.6k+ accuracy AFTER accuracy cards are equipped.
 2* = After maxing the damage talents, place excess points into "Farsight".
3* = If you have maxed Farsight, the rest of the points can go into mana.
6103_sha_act_90_camarok.json.comment_two:
Put 1 points into each active skill then max "Power Overwhelming", "Knowledge is Power" and "Individual Insight". Afterwards, put 50 points into "You're Next"
*1 = Extra points can be placed into mana.
6103_sha_act_90_camarok.json.comment_three:
Put 1 point in every active skill. Max "Virile Vials", this will be a huge source of damage. For burst damage, max "Crazy Concoctions".
*1 = You can put some points into "Earlier Education" if you're lacking points on Tab 2.
*2 = Excess points can be used to improve skills. Note that "Auspicious Aura" increases in size every 35 points.
6103_sha_act_90_camarok.json.notes:
FMJ Bullet, Midnight Cookie, Golden Kebabs, and Golden Nomwich if you are not afraid to step away and swap to healing food as needed. A single properly used crazy concoctions can one shot Chaotic Amarok in combination with your auto attack. Perfect vial usage is 350 ms (.35 seconds) then release for damage vial, if fast enough you can throw 4 vials making this fight very easy.
100+ = Checkout books for these talents from the library.

6105_sham_afk_50.json.title: Shaman / AFK (~50)
6105_sham_afk_50.json.comment_one:
*1 = Boost AGI to have as much accuracy as you need for the best AFK gains. Usually this will be the farthest monster you can reach without dying. If you're low on defense, by this point equipping food to stay alive is normal and expected.
"Idle Casting" to 50 for 10% AFK gain rate.
Priority switches to "Overclocked Energy" > "Gilded Sword" > "Sharpened axe"
6105_sham_afk_50.json.comment_two: Level "Power Overwhelming" to 60, then your active damage skills. Excess points can be used to level "Power Overwhelming" past 60.
6105_sham_afk_50.json.comment_three:
Level the damage skills evenly.
*1 = If you have many Green Vials, you can place 20-30 points into "Virile Vials" for more damage.
*2 = You can put some points into "Earlier Education" if you're lacking points on Tab 2.
6105_sham_afk_50.json.notes: Active Skills directly increase AFK kills/hr.

6105_sham_afk_70.json.title: Shaman / AFK (~70)
6105_sham_afk_70.json.comment_one:
*1 = Boost AGI to have as much accuracy as you need for the best AFK gains. Usually this will be the farthest monster you can reach without dying. If you're low on defense, by this point equipping food to stay alive is normal and expected.
"Idle Casting" to 100 for 13% AFK gain rate.
Priority switches to "Overclocked Energy" > "Gilded Sword" > "Sharpened Axe"
6105_sham_afk_70.json.comment_two:
Level "Power Overwhelming" to 100, then 70 to Fireball.
*1 = If you are not AFK damage capped, you can add more points into "Energy Bolt" until you hit cap.
*2 = Spread excess points equally between "Knowledge is Power" and "Individual Insight".
6105_sham_afk_70.json.comment_three:
Level the damage skills evenly.
*1 = If you have many Green Vials, you can place points into "Virile Vials" for more damage.
*2 = You can put some points into "Earlier Education" if you're lacking points on Tab 2.

6105_sham_afk_90.json.title: Shaman / AFK (~90)

6105_sham_afk_90.json.comment_three:
Level the damage skills evenly.
*1 If you need damage, place points into "Virile Vials".
*2 = You can put some points into "Earlier Education" if you're lacking points on Tab 2.
 *3 = If you have capped your damage, excess points can go into alchemy talents. This build does not prominently focus on alchemy, and so you are likely to only have enough talent points to level "Bubble Breakthrough".

Rams_hunter_active_150.json.title: Rams active hunter 150+
Rams_hunter_active_150.json.notes: 1* - boosted only if there's problems with survi. 2*- you need ~540 mana to sustain your skills. 3*-puttin 20 into 2nd/3rd arrow each would be good enough 4*-you can decide if you want more ms/crit for active or away gains talent to not loose as much when youre not actively farming
